newArtifact.title: New Artifact
artifact.title: Artifact
artifactRenderer.title.label: Artifact Name
artifactRenderer.isPinned.help: When checked, you'll see this artifact appear on the dashboard in a separate section so that you can quickly access it.
artifactRenderer.incomingArtifactReferen: The artifacts listed here reference the artifact you're viewing somewhere in their content.
artifactRenderer.artifactReferences.help: The artifacts listed here are referenced by the artifact you're viewing somewhere in it's content.
artifactRenderer.artifactShares.help: This artifact is shared with any of the individuals listed here
artifactRenderer.artifactSharedToYou.hel: This artifact doesn't belong to you, but is shared to you from another user. This user could revoke your access at any time.
artifactSharing.title: Manage Artifact Access
artifactSharing.existing.help: This list shows all users who have access to this artifact and their associated access level. You can change the access level to revoke or change their ability to change this asset.
artifactSharing.knownUsers.help: This list includes users who you have shared artifacts with in the past.
artifactSharing.search.help: You can search for a user by their account email address and give them access to this artifact. If they do not have an account, they will need to register for one to be given write access.
artifactSharing.links.help: Share links make it easy for you to send an artifact via other platforms. When you create a share link, anyone with the link will be able to view (and edit, if you allow) the content you've created within your artifact.
artifactSharing.links.null: No share links have been created for this artifact
Allowing users to add this to their account allows them to interact with the artifact as if it were their own (within your set permissions). We recommend you enable this when sharing with friends, but recommend against enabling this when you share with the public (for instance, posting on the web).
artifactSharing.links.delete.title: Delete Link
artifactSharing.links.delete.message: Are you sure? This action is irreversible, and the link associated will become dead/unusable.
editor.placeholder: Changes are automatically saved. Use / to bring up the command menu, or @ to reference another artifact
